SpidSpMetadataCheck.test: SpidSpMetadataCheck.xsd_check
Only one EntityDescriptor element MUST be present
The entityID attribute MUST be present
The entityID attribute MUST have a value
Only one SPSSODescriptor element MUST be present
The NameIDFormat MUST be urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:transient
the metadata signature MUST be valid
The Signature element MUST be present
The SignatureMethod element MUST be present
The Algorithm attribute MUST be present in SignatureMethod element
The signature algorithm MUST be valid
The DigestMethod element MUST be present
The Algorithm attribute MUST be present in DigestMethod element
The digest algorithm MUST be valid
At least one signing KeyDescriptor MUST be present
At least one signing x509 MUST be present
At least one encryption x509 MUST be present
One or more SingleLogoutService elements MUST be present
The Binding attribute in SingleLogoutService element MUST be present
The Binding attribute in SingleLogoutService element MUST have a value
The Binding attribute in SingleLogoutService element MUST be one of [urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST, urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-Redirect]
The Location attribute in SingleLogoutService element MUST be present
The Location attribute in SingleLogoutService element MUST have a value
The Location attribute in SingleLogoutService element MUST be a valid HTTP URL
At least one AssertionConsumerService MUST be present
The index attribute MUST be present
The index attribute MUST be >= 0
The Binding attribute MUST be present
The Binding attribute MUST be one of [urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST, urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-Redirect]
The Location attribute MUST be present
One or more AttributeConsumingService elements MUST be present
Only one Organization element can be present
SpidSpMetadataCheck.value:
['<Organization>
    <OrganizationName xml:lang="it">Comune di Campobasso</OrganizationName>
    <OrganizationDisplayName xml:lang="it">Comune di Campobasso</OrganizationDisplayName>
    <OrganizationURL xml:lang="it">https://comune.campobasso.it</OrganizationURL>
  </Organization>
  ']

SpidSpMetadataCheck.test: SpidSpMetadataCheck.xsd_check
The protocolSupportEnumeration attribute MUST be present
The protocolSupportEnumeration attribute MUST have a value
The AuthnRequestsSigned attribute MUST be present
The AuthnRequestsSigned attribute MUST have a value
The AuthnRequestsSigned attribute MUST be true
Only one default AssertionConsumerService MUST be present
Must be present the default AssertionConsumerService with index = 0
The index attribute in AttributeConsumigService element MUST be present
The index attribute in AttributeConsumigService element MUST be >= 0
The ServiceName element MUST be present
The ServiceName element MUST have a value
One or more RequestedAttribute elements MUST be present
The Name attribute in RequestedAttribute element MUST be present
The "spidCode" attribute in RequestedAttribute element MUST be valid
SpidSpMetadataCheck.value: one of [address, companyName, companyFiscalNumber, countyOfBirth, dateOfBirth, digitalAddress, email, expirationDate, familyName, fiscalNumber, gender, idCard, ivaCode, mobilePhone, name, placeOfBirth, registeredOffice, spidCode, domicileStreetAddress, domicilePostalCode, domicileMunicipality, domicileProvince, domicileNation]

SpidSpMetadataCheck.test: AttributeConsumigService MUST not contain duplicated RequestedAttribute
The //ContactPerson/EmailAddress element MUST be present
The //ContactPerson/EmailAddress element MUST have a value
The //ContactPerson/EmailAddress element MUST be a valid email address
The //ContactPerson/TelephoneNumber element MUST have a value
The //ContactPerson/TelephoneNumber element MUST not contain spaces
The //ContactPerson/TelephoneNumber element MUST start with "+39"
ContactPerson MUST be present

test: Missing contactType in {'contactType': 'other'}: The contactType attribute MUST be present

SpidSpMetadataCheck.test: The contactType attribute MUST have a value
The contactType must be "other"
Only one ContactPerson element of contactType "other" MUST be present
Only one Extensions element inside ContactPerson element MUST be present
only one VATNumber element must be present
Missing ContactPerson/Extensions/Public, this element MUST be present
The Public element MUST be empty
The Private element MUST not be present

SpidSpAuthnReqCheck.test: One AuthnRequest element MUST be present
The ID attribute MUST be present
The ID attribute MUST have a value
The Version attribute MUST be present
The Version attribute MUST be 2.0
The IssueInstant attribute MUST be present
The IssueInstant attribute MUST have a value
The IssueInstant attribute MUST be a valid UTC string
The Destination attribute MUST be present
The Destination attribute MUST have a value
The Destination attribute SHOULD be the address to which the request has been sent but can also be the EnityID of IdP (Av. SPID n.11)
The IsPassive attribute MUST not be present - TR pag. 9
One Issuer element MUST be present
The Issuer element MUST have a value
The Issuer's value MUST be equal to entityID
The Format attribute MUST be present
The Format attribute MUST have a value
The Format attribute MUST be urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:entity
The NameQualifier attribute MUST be present
The NameQualifier attribute MUST have a value
RelayState MUST not be immediately intelligible
The Signature element MUST be present
The SignatureMethod element MUST be present
The Algorithm attribute MUST be present in SignatureMethod element
The signature algorithm MUST be valid
The DigestMethod element MUST be present
The Algorithm attribute MUST be present in DigestMethod element
The digest algorithm MUST be one of [http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha256, http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha384, http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#sha512]
AuthnRequest Signature validation failed
The ForceAuthn attribute MUST be present if SPID level > 1
The ForceAuthn attribute MUST be true or 1 - TR pag. 8
The AssertionConsumerServiceURL attribute MUST be present
The AssertionConsumerServiceURL attribute MUST have a value
The AssertionConsumerServiceURL attribute MUST be equal to an AssertionConsumerService Location
The ProtocolBinding attribute MUST be present
The ProtocolBinding attribute MUST have a value
The ProtocolBinding attribute MUST be urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:bindings:HTTP-POST
The AttributeConsumingServiceIndex attribute MUST have a value
The AttributeConsumingServiceIndex attribute MUST be >= 0
The AttributeConsumingServiceIndex attribute MUST be equal to an AttributeConsumingService index
One NameIDPolicy element MUST be present
The Format attribute MUST be present
The Format attribute MUST have a value
The Format attribute MUST be urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:nameid-format:transient
The AllowCreate attribute MUST not be present
Only one RequestedAuthnContext element MUST be present
The Comparison attribute MUST be present
The Comparison attribute MUST have a value
Attribute not valid
SpidSpAuthnReqCheck.value: The Comparison attribute MUST be one of [exact, minimum, better, maximum]

SpidSpAuthnReqCheck.test: Only one AuthnContexClassRef element MUST be present
The AuthnContexClassRef element MUST have a value
The AuthnContextClassRef element MUST have a valid SPID level
